XXLChess

类 Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • XXLChess.Tile

  • public class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
    The `Tile` class represents a single tile on a chessboard. Each tile can have a row and column position, a piece (if any), and x and y coordinates in pixels for rendering purposes.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Tile(int row, int column)
      Constructs a `Tile` object with the specified row and column positions.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      int getColumn()
      Return the column position of the tile.
      Piece getPiece()
      Retrieves the piece on the tile.
      int getRow()
      Return the row position of the tile.
      int getX()
      Return the x-coordinate position of the tile.
      int getY()
      Return the y-coordinate position of the tile.
      void setColumn(int column)
      Sets the column position of the tile.
      void setPiece(Piece piece)
      Sets the piece on the tile.
      void setRow(int row)
      Sets the row position of the tile.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Tile

        public Tile(int row,
            int column)
        Constructs a `Tile` object with the specified row and column positions. The default piece on the tile is set to null. The x and y positions are calculated based on the row and column.
        参数:
        row - The row position of the tile.
        column - The column position of the tile.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setPiece

        public void setPiece(Piece piece)
        Sets the piece on the tile.
        参数:
        piece - The piece to be set on the tile.

      • getPiece

        public Piece getPiece()
        Retrieves the piece on the tile.
        返回:
        The piece on the tile.

      • setRow

        public void setRow(int row)
        Sets the row position of the tile. Updates the y-coordinate position accordingly.
        参数:
        row - The new row position of the tile.

      • getRow

        public int getRow()
        Return the row position of the tile.
        返回:
        The row position of the tile.

      • setColumn

        public void setColumn(int column)
        Sets the column position of the tile. Updates the x-coordinate position accordingly.
        参数:
        column - The new column position of the tile.

      • getColumn

        public int getColumn()
        Return the column position of the tile.
        返回:
        The column position of the tile.

      • getX

        public int getX()
        Return the x-coordinate position of the tile.
        返回:
        The x-coordinate position of the tile.

      • getY

        public int getY()
        Return the y-coordinate position of the tile.
        返回:
        The y-coordinate position of the tile.
